title: Seems like back when the USS North Carolina was brought to Wilmington, there was some land swapping deals made between New Hanover and Brunswick counties involving the land around the battleship and Bald Head Island. Were deals made and what were they? Frankie Thomas (former mayor) of Leland and Tommy Harrelson (former state representative)of Southport may be helpful.
text:
I haven't been able to track down a definitive answer to this, and
unfortunately most of the people with direct connections to this have
only hazy memories. Sorry. If anything new comes up, I'll try to
revisi this one.
